screen_desc: The screenshot shows an Amazon shopping cart with a subtotal of $118.29. The item in the cart is the Razer Thresher For Xbox One. There is an option to proceed to checkout, and a button to send the item as a gift with a custom message. Below the cart, there are recommendations for other items customers who bought the cart item have also bought.
action_think: The shopping cart has been emptied and the Razer Thresher has been added to the cart. The user request has been completed.
action_result: The execution of user request is stopped.
